00035 #include "EdgeLengthQualityMetric.hpp"
00036 #include "Vector3D.hpp"
00037 #include "QualityMetric.hpp"
00038 #include "MsqVertex.hpp"
00039 #include "PatchData.hpp"
00040 #include "MsqError.hpp"
00041 
00042 #include <math.h>
00043 
00044 using namespace Mesquite;
00045 
00046 std::string EdgeLengthQualityMetric::get_name() const
00047   { return "Edge Length"; }
00048 
00049 int EdgeLengthQualityMetric::get_negate_flag() const
00050   { return 1; }
00051 
00052 bool EdgeLengthQualityMetric::evaluate_common(PatchData &pd, 
00053                                               size_t this_vert,
00054                                               double &fval, 
00055                                               std::vector<size_t>& adj_verts,
00056                                               MsqError &err)
00057 {
00058   fval=0.0;
00059   pd.get_adjacent_vertex_indices(this_vert,adj_verts,err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00060   const unsigned num_sample_points=adj_verts.size();
00061   double *metric_values=new double[num_sample_points];
00062   const MsqVertex* verts = pd.get_vertex_array(err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00063   for (unsigned i = 0; i < num_sample_points; ++i) 
00064     metric_values[i] = (verts[this_vert] - verts[adj_verts[i]]).length();
00065   fval=average_metrics(metric_values,num_sample_points,err);  
00066   delete[] metric_values;
00067   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00068   
00069 }
00070 
00071 bool EdgeLengthQualityMetric::evaluate( PatchData& pd, 
00072                                         size_t vertex, 
00073                                         double& value, 
00074                                         MsqError& err )
00075 {
00076   std::vector<size_t> verts;
00077   bool rval = evaluate_common( pd, vertex, value, verts, err );
00078   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && rval;
00079 }
00080 
00081 bool EdgeLengthQualityMetric::evaluate_with_indices( PatchData& pd,
00082                                                      size_t vertex,
00083                                                      double& value,
00084                                                      std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00085                                                      MsqError& err )
00086 {
00087   indices.clear();
00088   bool rval = evaluate_common( pd, vertex, value, indices, err );
00089   
00090   std::vector<size_t>::iterator r, w;
00091   for (r = w = indices.begin(); r != indices.end(); ++r) {
00092     if (*r < pd.num_free_vertices()) {
00093       *w = *r;
00094       ++w;
00095     }
00096   }
00097   indices.erase( w, indices.end() );
00098   if (vertex < pd.num_free_vertices())
00099     indices.push_back( vertex );
00100   
00101   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && rval;
00102 }
